name: 卡赖伯·兰德里·琼斯 Caleb Landry Jones
intro: Jones was born in Garland, Texas and raised in Richardson, Texas. He is best known for his performances in The Last Exorcism, as Banshee in X-Men: First Class, and as Andy in Baltasar Kormákur's thriller film Contraband for Universal opposite Mark Wahlberg.
